fullText: This revival of Ken Ludwig's 1989 Broadway farce proves that even the most expertly crafted comedic machinery can feel creaky when it's not firing on all cylinders.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of Ken Ludwig's 1989 Broadway farce proves that even the most expertly crafted comedic machinery can feel creaky when it's not firing on all cylinders.
